snippet: The Super Bowl has become more accessible, to more teams, in recent years, as our dynasty index and accessibility index show.
abstract: The Upshot; NFL dynasties seem to be less common than in years past; it has been nine years since any NFL team has appeared in two consecutive Super Bowls; both Seattle Seahawks and Denver Broncos have chance to break that streak this season.
lead_paragraph: The Super Bowl has become more accessible, to more teams, in recent years, as our dynasty index and accessibility index show.

headline.print_headline: Dynasties a Thing of the Past
